# RBE 2002 Lecture #1

# Parts of the Romi

* 2x motors (DC)
* 2x motor controller
* 1x ultrasonic sensor
* 1x JMU/ gyro
* 1x IR sensor
* 3x Button
* 3x magnetic encoders
* 1x ATMega23U4
* 2x Wheels
* 1x chassis/ extension
* voltage regulators
* 1x clock
* 1x gearbox (128 : 1)
* LEDs
* Buzzer
* capacitors
* connector -> Raspberry Pi
